entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then light snow changing to periods of rain near midnight. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 29 January 2023
